email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to provide a freight quote for the shipment of 150,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarao to Qingdao under CIF terms. The proposed vessel is MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 205,000 and LOA of 300m.

Our initial freight quote is USD 28.50 per metric ton. The laycan period is from October 20 to October 25. Please let us know your thoughts and if you require any additional details.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems reasonable, but we are looking to secure a long-term agreement for multiple shipments over the next year. Could you consider a discount for a volume commitment of 1 million metric tons?

Also, could you provide details on the demurrage rate and the vessel's current position?

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your interest in a long-term agreement. Considering your volume commitment, we can offer a revised rate of USD 27.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be USD 20,000 per day.

The vessel is currently en route to Tubarao and is expected to arrive on October 18. Please confirm if these terms meet your requirements.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

The revised rate of USD 27.00 per metric ton is acceptable. However, we need to ensure that the laytime is sufficient. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

The laytime will start on October 20 and end on October 25. We can offer a laytime of 5 days with the demurrage rate of USD 20,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable so we can proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez
Maritime Brokers
